feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
